Package it.polimi.ingsw.view.gui.controllers

package it.polimi.ingsw.view.gui.controllers
  • Interface Summary
    Interface
    Description
    ResettableScene
    A ResettableScene is a scene that can be be modified by the user/server, and can be took back to an initial state
  • Class Summary
    Class
    Description
    ActionTileController
    Represents the action tile for the single player mode
    BaseProductionController
    Represents the base production on the player dashboard.
    CofferController
    Represents the coffer on the player dashboard.
    DashboardController
    Represents the player dashboard.
    DevelopmentGridCardController
    Represents a stack of cards in the development card grid.

    Represents the development card grid
    DevelopmentSpaceController
    Represents the development space

    Represents the screen shown at the end of the match

    Represents the leader card

    Represents the lobby of the game
    MarketplaceController
    Represents the marketplace

    Manages what to view when spying the opponent
    PaycheckController
    Represents the paycheck
    PlayersController
    Represents the players' interfaces
    PopeFavorTilesController
    Represents the pope favor tile
    PreMatchController
    Represents the pre match phase
    SceneController
    This class abstracts some key components that all of the scenes must have
    SubSceneController
    Abstracts the concept of a sub-component inside a SceneController

    Represents the unassigned marbles picked from the marketplace

    Represents the waiting screen
